resources.string: Place your thumb on the table, last to do so, drinks!
Reach for the sky\nLast player drinks!
Choose a partner and drinks whenever the player drinks!
Say a rhyme\nNext player adds a line.\nIf you fail, drink!
Choose a category\nSay something that fits\nUntil whoever can\'t think of any, drink!
Complete the sentence,\n"Never have I ever.."\nAnyone who has, drink!
Ask a player a question\nThey must respond with another question to someone else\nFirst to fail, drink!
Set a new rule.\nFill the King\'s Cup!
Yes, this a drinking game. You can put all sorts of drinks and mix it together.\n\nDoesn\'t necessary has to be alcoholic.

Pick a person to start the game, select a card and do what it says.

There is no escape!
Pass to the next person when you are done.

Draw a King from the deck,
you will have the honour to choose any drinks to pour into the King's Cup.

Person with the last King will have to finish the cup in one shot!
Cheers mate.
